# shadow

**Instance Property**

The shadow for the spotlight.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var shadow: SpotLightComponent.Shadow? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property to `nil` to remove shadows for the light. Set it to an instance of [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SpotLightComponent/Shadow] to create shadows.
